website_summaries.verdict: An excellent space-saving storage solution for any nursery. Exposed boxes give you easy access and make tidying up quick and easy.
pros: Features 12 plastic bins stacked at an angle for ease of access
Comes with four large and eight standard storage containers
Different colors can help teach kids color identification skills
Innovative shelving system to keep the nursery tidy
cons: Some users report receiving damaged parts

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional and cute organizer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, well packaged and no damage to any of the pieces. It took me and my husband about 15 minutes to put two of these units together. They seem very sturdy and I'm so happy to have all my kids' toys organized and in one room instead of in different bins and baskets here and there throughout the house. I bought two pastel units and divided the colors between my 4 year old boy/girl twins. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very obviously damaged. The box wasn’t, so whoever packed it knew it was broken. The only reason I bought another is because I was adamant on it matching my other child’s. Update: The second order was worse than the first. Caked with dirt and mud, holes scraped on the sides, boxes broken.. never again! This company is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Troost

customer_reviews.title: WOBBLY
customer_reviews.text: This item is very wobbly. Just assembled it and I'm glad my daughters are older, if this went into a young child's room I'd be very worried. Three stars because it's been 48 hours and hasn't fallen apart yet. Would not recommend this brand. Update: I have been tightening the screws weekly, and they still come loose almost instantly. Had to prop it next to a wall so it doesn't fall over. If I could give it no stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Lots

customer_reviews.title: WHY DIDN'T I BUY THIS TWO YEARS AGO
customer_reviews.text: My four year old daughter loves these bins, she gets to organize all of her toys with ease now. Before, I was using those drawer storage boxes, which rapidly fell apart, & they were simply too small for the amount of toys that she had. It took me about 10 minutes to assemble, nothing special needed, just a Phillips screwdriver. The wood seems durable enough, & the bins are thick plastic, so they haven't cracked or broke or anything yet. This is by far the best purchase that I have made in a long time, across all spectrums.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: The look of the toy organizer is great. The problem I found is the buckets crack ...
customer_reviews.text: The look of the toy organizer is great. The problem I found is the buckets crack too easily. While I do have two toddlers, I was hoping the buckets would last a little longer. Another issue I found is the screws in the shelves come unscrewed. I find myself tightening the screws at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Quite large and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I had imagined. Pictured with same brand book shelf and table for size comparison. Holds a lot of toys. Was easy to assemble even though the instructions were just lacking a little bit of... Instruction.. it showed one main picture with all the parts showing where they went but was a little confusing on which direction the bottom stands were to go. Must have common sense for sure :) Besides that, kids love it and keeps things organized much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. For $50 I expected better material/quality. The bins are a very thin plastic and were broken upon delivery; the side boards are very cheap and made of composite particle board. Don't waste your money. Tried to contact the manufacturer through the website on the directions and it doesn't exist. Find another product.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Serve it purpose
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my child to have some more organization to toys and other things. I am satisfied with this particular one and the price was one of the cheapest. Personally I would like to see these about 1 foot longer. i prefer the larger tubs to the small ones. I would recommend this for anyone looking to get toys off the floor are sick of looking for that 'one toy' your child can't seem to find.
customer_reviews.author: Dijo Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daughter’s playroom. About to buy 2nd!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my daughter’s play room! As you can see, she has a lot of toys. The colors of the bins go great with her girly items. Easy to assemble. Comes with parts to secure to wall so shelf doesn’t tip over. We have a 5 yr old so we didn’t secure to walk and it hasn’t tipped over but I like that I have the option and that might be necessary for younger children. About to buy a 2nd to get more organized!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Keep the toys off the ground
customer_reviews.text: As a parent i love this! My daughter now has no excuse to have her toys all over the place since she has a bin for each type of toy! It's also nice that if she wants to play with Lego's i can just pull down the whole box and we can dig through them together. The product itself is fairly stable, i wouldn't put anything too heave on it or try to wobble it but its stable enough to sit on ground and hold toys.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together, is sturdy and well made. Looks nice. Pastel is definitely soft pastel colors. My only problems was that it came with NO bolts. I called the company, got the website address and wrote up a request for the missing pieces (not expecting much). But they emailed me back the next day and got them sent out quickly. I think I had the pieces in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Came super fast. Shipped out and arrived the very next day! Super happy with this product. It makes my daughter’s corner in our living room look organized. Finally! Super easy to assemble and I only needed a screwdriver to do it. Took about half an hour to do two. I will most likely buy another one for future use. I prefer these over toy chests because my children can see their toys and don’t have to dig through a big pile of stuff. I also like that this item comes with “feet” for extra stability.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and sent incomplete.
customer_reviews.text: Package came damaged. Box looked to have been retaped. One bin was broken, laminate leg of one side was cracked, but worst of all- I stupidly put the darn thing nearly together before realizing one of the metal poles was missing. Their fault for sending an incomplete product, my fault for not checking all the materials were present before attempting assembly. Super frustrating I can’t just get a new bin and pole sent to me and have to send this huge box back. This was supposed to be a gift for grandson’s room for Xmas. smh.
customer_reviews.author: MLA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toy organization!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is JUST what I was looking for! My little one's room was chaos and I couldn't wait to get this so I could finally get it under control. My boss has used an older model of this for years and still owns the plastic bins so I thought I would take a chance on this. So glad I did! The plastic bins are so easy to clean, compared to their fabric competitors and the shelf stands at the perfect height for my almost 4 year old. I may end up buying another one of these in the next few months. Also, set up was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Bad stabilizing braces.
customer_reviews.text: We like the product. We purchased it twice. First time was installed by my husband. Second time I tried to install it myself and realized I’ve screw on the wrong size of the panel for the stabilizing braces, and I tired unscrew it and the screw and the metal ring from the stabilizing braces came out all together. It’s now so hard to take them apart. And one of the stabilizing braces won’t be secured with screw. It’s still a good product if you done it right the first time. Otherwise it can be a bad product. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good size but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good size toy organizer. My toddler is very curious and likes to mess with things so I wouldn't recommend this for someone who has an active toddler. (She keeps removing the bins from the organizer). It’s also not as sturdy as I hoped it to be. My 15mo old could probably push it over if I let her.
customer_reviews.author: T-Chan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and materials, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a few of this style toy organizer and bought this one based on the color and reviews. It’s so cheap I can’t believe I paid over $20. My other ones are wood, this is MDF covered in very cheap laminate. On top of that the bars are metal, these are not going to be kid friendly. One toy dropped and they are going to bend in a second. There are chips on every edge, scratches on the (thin and cheap) tubs and what is most definitely blood on the side! Ew! 2 stars only because assembly was so quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: JustJ

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot more than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute storage. Somehow my toddler has accumulated so much stuff in the past 3 years! Every time we want to donate a toy we see her playing with it again so decide to keep it. So we ordered this storage solution. We already outgrowing our home with just me, my husband and daughter. Husband was skeptical about this but it holds so much stuff and it is visible at eye level for her to still get to her things. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pepperbear

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons room was always a mess, but he helped assemble this and decide which bins to put his toys in, and now he feels proud of his room when he gets everything put in its place. Since there is a place for everything, the task of picking up is less daunting. His room is small, but this fits against the wall right behind the door. It is surprising how many LEGO’s, cars, super heroes, dinosaurs, art supplies etc. can fit in these bins!
customer_reviews.author: froggy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but small containers
customer_reviews.text: I liked this toy organizer in pictures a lot but in real the bins are very small and don't hold much. I was surprised to see the number of total toys they could hold. You can not put medium size toys in the second and third row because of a bin above it. I could not even fit toys the size of v tech drop and go dumb truck. Not very happy with my purchase but uninstalling it and returning is a hassle that I want to stay away from. Having said that it will work best for legos.
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Do. Not. Buy. If you are a mom of a prefect angel child, this is fine. But I’m a mom of two very rambunctious little boys and this product couldn’t hold up to a week with them. I recommend bolting it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bless This Peach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toy Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to assemble. It's also easy to slide the bins on to and off of the poles. It's perfect for small toys and accessories. Barbie dolls fit in the larger of the bins while their clothes and other accessories fit well in the small bins. The bins can easily fit Matchbox Cars, art supplies, and any number of other toys, as well. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, lightweight, yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and surprisingly sturdy. The tubs are colorful and rest lightly on the bars. My 2 year old grandson loves it and immediately filled the tubs with his toys. It also comes with brackets to attach it to the wall to prevent tipping over. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BarbP

customer_reviews.title: Organize and creates a creative environment for kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this addition to the playroom. It helps my kids know where to put up their toys and what is available to play with - also it creates more creativity and independence to get toys and ideas to play on their own. Great product! Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: ewgigem

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This can store a lot of toys but the downside of this is when you use any if the bottom bins if the toys are tall it knocks the bins around and is hard to put away and retrieve the toy. That is annoying and why I give it 4 stars ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ Great toy bin otherwise and doesn’t take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Israel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size toy organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for kids room. Easy assembly. Holds a lot of toys. Love the different pastel color bins. Easy reach for my 2 year old great grandson. Bins available in different colors. Bottom of rack has extended "feet" on both sides for stability.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: limited to very light duty only
customer_reviews.text: It's really weak, but acceptable for very lightweight stuff. If you put anything that has even moderate weight in it, such as filling a single tub mostly with lego toys, the tub will fall between the rails onto the next lower row of tubs. It's pretty weeble-wobbly after only a few weeks of kid use too. I recommend spending more on something more sturdy with more structural integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore A Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Defective Rod! (Much shorter than rest and can’t build safely!)
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived no damages and while unboxing saw that everything was wrapped neatly and no cracks on anything (buckets are very vibrant!) , here’s where it turns sour... I was really excited to put this shelf together, upon building I noticed one the the rods was significantly shorter than the rest!. Not quite sure what to do now, I’m very bummed and I feel it’s not quite safe for my 8 month old also being defective as it is. I still really love the design though and have the matching book shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for organization!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my son's room! I am very happy with my purchase and everything came in brand new condition. My 2 year old son also loves it and the colors. It's fun to sort his small plastic balls in each bucket. The only thing is it can't store big stuff only little toys but that's not too big of a deal. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toys/Dress Up
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to my daughter’s room. It holds a lot of items and keeps things well organized. It seems flimsy when first putting it together, but once it’s assembled it is much sturdier. I wouldn’t recommend having young kids climb on it. The bins don’t sit perfectly on the shelves as they move quite a bit, but it wasn’t a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon20

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: Review update: I changed my review to one star as I noticed more damage. I could maybe give the wood fresh paint but with cracked bins it affects functionality and is a hazard to my child. I updated my review shortly after the first but I just realized it didn't go through. I just got this today and it was damaged. I haven't had a chance to use it yet so don't know how funtional it is yet. That's why it's getting a 2 star and not a 1 star. The extra star is for me trying to stay optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Fits lots of small-medium toys, good price
customer_reviews.text: I really like having this for my sons playroom. It gives us a place to put lots of his cars and toys. We haven't needed to mount it to the wall yet but he's pretty strong so we may eventually. Good price for a storage solution where he can still actually see all his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Caples

customer_reviews.title: would buy again. nice product
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being a great purchase for us. While initially worried that it might be on the small side, it ended up being just right. it fits a lot of toys, and the two bin sizes let you sort the toys well. and even the large bins are easy for small hands to move about. It was easy to construct and looks like it will last quite a while. As long as our daughter doesn't try and use it as a ladder i think it should last a very long time. The only note is that you need an extra touch of patience to nudge each bar into place when putting the two sides on, but its really minor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lamborn

customer_reviews.title: works as i expected it would
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my child to have some more organization to toys and other things. I am satisfied with this particular one and the price was one of the cheapest. Personally I would like to see these about 1 foot longer. i prefer the larger tubs to the small ones. I would recommend this for anyone looking to get toys off the floor are sick of looking for that 'one toy' your child can't seem to find.
customer_reviews.author: Geek Dad

customer_reviews.title: New?/Returned?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered new & I believe I got used!?!?! Screw package open with screws everywhere in box & 1 hanging from edge of packing box. Packing box was intact but double taped ( like it was opened & retaped on both ends)?!?!?! Very suspicious!!! Also some of the screw heads were knicked like used screws. Very ez to assemble & product is sturdy. I’m keeping it even though it looks like it was a returned item.
customer_reviews.author: DenT

customer_reviews.title: Super great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on the size but it holds everything and is SUPER easy to assemble by yourself. 2 of the bins did come a little dirty but a quick wipe down fixed that. And it’s much sturdier than I thought it would be. The poles are metal which is nice. Over all 10/10 I defiantly recommend to purchase if you’re in the market for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: kalee hendon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but plastic bins break easily
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and the unit itself was easy to assemble. However the method that the plastic containers were stacked together compactly caused one to crack as I was separating everything from the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep the house neat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very good at putting things together but I put this together in a very short amount of time. The colors are bright and cute, the buckets are easily removed to switch it up a bit and super easy to clean. It's a pretty decent size and has enough space for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Simple Organization
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to organize toys with smaller parts. Setup was very easy and I had no issue with the bins sticking together as some people mentioned in comments. The unit is pretty solid and has some weight to it once the bins are filled. However, we will be figuring out some way to mount it to the wall once my son starts pulling up on things. I imagine we will have this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewTheThings

customer_reviews.title: Great toy organizer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toybox. I got it to replace my sons paw patrol delta toy organizer. It's taller, wider and holds a lot more. I put it together in less than ten minutes. Very sturdy, and looks good in his room. I'm happy I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristian M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and as pictured
customer_reviews.text: One side panel had a crushed spot on edge- a see pic- opted to keep item cuz damage doesn’t interfere w use. And it’s on the back side. Just putting it together - seems sturdy, as are the bins.
customer_reviews.author: Cia

customer_reviews.title: Great but.
customer_reviews.text: This has been so great. We rigged anchor to wall which has been fine. Nicely stores our toys. Many of them. Neatly. My daughter loves rummaging through her toys with this and the colors are really bright but not garish which we love.
customer_reviews.author: Bride2be

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. It’s not super sturdy or solid but I didn’t expect it to be. It allowed me to organize the toys and the kids love it because they can actually find them now. I really like that you can take the bins out to play on the floor and put them back easily. Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: My 5th graders put these together for me last year. I moved to a new school and to 1st grade. They held up during the move and have lasted through 1st graders pulling things out and cramming them back in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Daly

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Love this, so colorful and actually I don't have small children, as I am using this for my Quilting pieces and fabrics. Perfect and bright colors. Only problem was the bottom leg needed a new screw as it was broken off inside...The thread was no good in the wood leg part to handle the screw that went in...:( Otherwise its very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Kids be kids and take all of tays out from all bins daily. Lids would be nice...
customer_reviews.text: My one year old and two year old like to take all of the bins and dump all their contents (hint loads of toys) onto the floors. It would be nice to have clear locking lids included with the bins. For this reason I would not recommend this organizer. It does not make life easier at all due to this reason.
customer_reviews.author: CuriouslySerious

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't buy this years ago; every babysitter has one, and they usually know what's up! It holds so many toys and allows for kids to see what they need without digging through a toy boy or deeper bin. I'm considering getting rid of our other toy storage and buying another of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mollatron

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but broken, so sad...
customer_reviews.text: The colors of the baskets are very pretty. The size of the whole product is also good. It looks cute in the room. The children like it very much. We were so excited to assemble them. This is quite effective to store all the toys and keep the children’s room clean. However, we are disappointed to find that four corners of the wooden panels are chipped, moreover, the pink basket is also broken. I guess that was caused during the shipping. They are heavy so we don’t want to return. We used some tapes to fix all the broken parts. Wish the supplier could improve the packaging to protect the product during shipment.
customer_reviews.author: PK CT

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon Purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed by just how much this amazing little organizer can hold! This has replaced four toy bins strewn about in my living room and I couldn’t be happier. Set this up in about ten minutes and let my girls put all of their toys in it and they had a blast! Very well built and no problems! JUST BUY IT ALREADY!
customer_reviews.author: Bre McAlister

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this a long time ago. It was a little bigger than I expected but worked out great. The storage bins are of good quality as is the wood. It was easy to put together. I like it a lot, it has freed up a lot of space in my children's room.
customer_reviews.author: LaKiki

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the kids playroom, it’s a great organizer. Lots of room, easy to assemble and sturdy. I was going to purchase one from an target for $66 but I paid $45 for this one and it’s great! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great toy bin, bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing I have to say is some of the tubes had dents in them. Other than that this toy bin is great! Super easy to put together, and the bins are much bigger than I expected. It will make keeping the toys clean and organized so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came with scratches in the white side board but by the time I noticed it, it wasn’t worth trying to return such a bulky item. Not as high quality as the ones in department stores, but definitely less expensive. It will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be been better if it wasn't tilted so much and a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but does not hold much toys and tend to spill out when trying to pull a bin out. Can only really fill half way... Already using it so I'll keep it but will look for something that holds more. Would be been better if it wasn't tilted so much and a little more space between the there to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: a.song

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as our house was a mess from all the children's toys! It was slightly hard to assemble (thankfully my handy husband did it), and it's heavy. But that said, it's very durable and well made. The baskets are bright colored plastic and we would buy another one as it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justine A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks used!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and it looks used. There's dirt smudges on the wood, paint is chipped in multiple places, and there's a small hole on one of the side pieces. Absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Usagi Chiba

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite toy box shelves for my 2 year old grandson. Sturdy and very colorful. Lots of room in each container. He can remove each one to play with and some I have taped down. Easy to assemble and stays in place. It looks good. Love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Easy, cute, and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: An early 1st birthday present for our daughter. It’s adorable and a perfect height and size for toddlers to reach their toys! We’re very happy with this item, and the assembly was super easy and fast. Thinking about getting this again in the future for more toys and things. Also the shipping was fast too. Overall, a nice item! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Timmie

customer_reviews.title: Simple assembly, just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy organizer for my four-year-old who has lots of little annoying toys instead of big annoying toys. It's easy for him to see his toys and put them back. My favorite thing about this item was how intuitive the assembly was.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toy organizer that we have and we use it to store a lot of things in our toy room. It has quality pastel totes that can be rearranged as required and can be used to store toys, books, stuffed animals, tiny items like shopkins, etc. It is pretty easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: True Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Storage & organizer
customer_reviews.text: This storage organizer is easy to assemble and a great way to store a variety of toys and items. One of the large containers arrived with a broken corner. Attempting to obtain a replacement container.
customer_reviews.author: Chip78

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great quality and broken piece :(
customer_reviews.text: This looks very cute in my daughters room but the quality is def not worth the price. The plastic bins are not very strong , one came with a corner broken and one of the wood pieces is chipped. So sad. I was disappointed. I am not going to return it because my husband already put it together and it’s such a Hassel to deal with returning. But I think this is worth half the price I paid for :(
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps us pick up.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps it organized, looks good. The buckets go upstairs, downstairs, outside, to Grandmas. Hopefully my toddler will learn organization from cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a soft box one that was a bit cheaper. Well that was a mistake. The bins with this are awesome for you sorting. Very sturdy frame. My kid enjoys putting her stuff away and I like the cleaner space.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this shelf displays the toys for her unlike a toy chest. I think she will play with more things simply bc she can see them! The colors are also very lovely and go nicely with her things.
customer_reviews.author: Sevon

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was great for 3 weeks... Now I have to keep tightening it daily. It just loosens & sits lopsided all day.
customer_reviews.author: Trista l Pearson

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy again if I needed one
customer_reviews.text: It is as described. I love that I can have my living room back. My LO now has a place to keep her toys that is neat and organized.
customer_reviews.author: AKlimAted Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect with a few modifications
customer_reviews.text: Set this up for our son and so far its wonderful!! I drilled a small hole in each bin and zip tied them to the bars to secure them. I also added a wall anchor to prevent tipping. I detracted one star because it doesnt come with a wall anchor. However, after making the modifiit's perfect! Its nearly perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Organizing!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very simple! I love the bright colored bins. This works perfect for my office's children's room. I also think this setup helps children learn to put toys away in their "correct" spots, instead of having one giant bin of toys.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and well made. Adds a fun for the kids storage element and encourages them to pick up their toys. At least that’s my plan! Surprising my granddaughter with a playroom at my house 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Marion Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Came with eyesore damage bc of lack of protection from box damage. But other than that its perfect. Holds a ton and super easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Megan Newman

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy one of the leg was broken when received it first the date of delivery supossibly the driver had difficulty opening the gate all he had to do was open the door and deliver the item and he delivered the next day when opened it the leg was defective my husband could not assemble it picture attached
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my littles’ toys. It fits a ton of toys. It fits in their closet, so it’s helping to reduce the mess in our house. It’s pretty sturdy, my oldest is a little rough with the buckets and nothing as broken yet:
customer_reviews.author: Journey O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Granddaughter’s Room
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 2 year old granddaughter. Easy for her to get/put away toys and books. Easy to put together and sturdy enough for her things. Small footprint and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Ash

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my most favorite purchased in the last few months the pastel colors ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my most favorite purchased in the last few months the pastel colors are so cute I can't stop looking at it my daughter loves it it's bigger than I thought it would be and my daughter is able to get her toys out and put them back when she is done playing I would give this 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I expected and the tubs are also smaller than expected. I’ve had it for like two or three years and it’s in great shape still, so I do recommend. If you have toddlers prepare for toys dumped out everywhere and bins scattered with them 😅
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Every kids room should have this!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this toy organizer. Pretty rugged stand and bins. Doesn't take up a lot of space too. Perfect for a small space that's needs organizing. What used to take my kids an hour to pick-up their room now only takes about 5 minutes. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that my 3 year olds playroom could be better organized and all of her little toys could have their own spot. I also hoped that it would help to keep her playroom cleaner. We received it on time, it took me all of 15 minutes to put it together. And it worked...the playroom is cleaner since all she does is pick the container that she wants to play with and then when shes done she puts that container back and chooses another one, where before she would dump every toy out of every toy box until she found what she wanted... WE LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this, she is 6 and have a room full of toys. She we needed organizing bad. This was the perfect addition to her room.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi06

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with this. Came in a sturdy box, no breaks or cracks, no missing pieces. Easy to assemble. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: posty429

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and tons of storage space!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this toy organizer! It was easy to put together, it’s sturdy, it’s made of real wood, and it brightens up the whole room. It also holds WAY more toys than I expected! For the price, I’m very pleased. Oh, and it comes with the materials to mount it to the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. This item makes the room look ao organized! I've purchased the greenvand red for My son, and this pink and purple one for my niece! Both of the kiddos love them. Great quality and overall awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Functional, if not the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure that it’s the greatest quality in the world, but it will Hopefully do it’s job until my kid is old enough to be rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Deron

customer_reviews.title: must for kid play room
customer_reviews.text: it’s the perfect toy organizer for your kids play room ! it’s always the area to be organized and the kids have fun cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy! So glad I bought this, it holds so many of my granddaughters toys. She loves that she had everything at her fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Third time buying it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 3 of these in 3 different colors for each of my kid’s rooms. I’ve had them for over a year now and they’ve all held up perfectly. Seriously the best toy organizer for a small space. I’ve built each one myself and takes me 20/30 mins with one screw driver super easy. Never an issue with missing hardware or incorrect holes. Highly recommend these for any kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Functional and great for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall! It's fairly cheap and there are no plugs or anything to cover the screws on the sides. So it's more functional than good looking but that's what it's all about. I used a steel wire bolted to the wall so it won't fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesmcfar112

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Organizer came well packaged. It was easy to assemble even though there were not any directions.
customer_reviews.author: meadower

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful solutions to large storage bins
customer_reviews.text: A great solution to storage bin mania! I was so tired of putting all of my daughters toys in big plastic storage boxes that were too deep for her to get to the toys on the bottom. This product offered the perfect solution to giving her the ability to have all of her toys at an arms reach. Its a great teaching tool too for sorting and color coding. My only complaint is that the screws don't fit completely on one side so they stick out. The piece is sturdy but I recommend placing it against a wall for extra support.
customer_reviews.author: dsell13

customer_reviews.title: Great toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple months now for my 1 year old and she loves it! I haven't had any issues with the containers like some people have said. The best thing about it is that she plays with all of her toys because she can see them, unlike when they were inside a toy box.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: not good not bad
customer_reviews.text: The quality is average, my daughter’s toys can be put in, the only thing is that it’s not easy to take out the container, if it’s better balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together, kids actually enjoy picking up now
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble. I thought of building one myself but it came to about the same cost when you add the buckets in. Our kids love the pastel colors and actually enjoy picking their toys up and sorting them.
customer_reviews.author: Just an Idaho Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's a great toy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this organizer, I'm pleased. It looks just like the photo. The only thing the screws get loose and I have to tighten them up from time to time
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great. My kids stand on the containers and they do not break. Was really easy to put together as well. They are on a steep angel so hard to use all of the bin without some coming out but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for girls room
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, easy to assemble, not the sturdiest if you move it but perfect for storage in a kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tot storage
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews. But this was easy to assemble and the bins are a sturdy plastic. Bottom feet stabilize the rack nicely. My daughter loves seeing her toys now without digging and I don't mind the clean up!
customer_reviews.author: heather nye

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture with lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: A great way to store and organize all my toddler's toys. The shelf was easy to assemble and is sturdy. The color of the bins (white, pink and purple version) is tasteful and will look good even as my child gets older it won't risk looking too childish.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good storage capacity, not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This has been helping me to keep my kids toys organized in one place. However it’s not very sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: customer 1

customer_reviews.title: Practical toy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy organizer. The number of the bins is enough and the size is sufficient. It took 15-20 minutes to assemble with no pressure. Strongly recommend if you have bunch of little toys and don't know where to put them
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great toy Box!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy and hold many of my daughters toys. Looks good in her room. Also purchased the bookshelf to match.
customer_reviews.author: amayani

product_meta.title: Humble Crew, White/Pastel Kids' Toy Storage Organizer
product_meta.description:
Color:White/Pastels

This space-saving Tot Tutors Kids Toy Storage Organizer with 12 Plastic Bins stores lots of children's toys in easy-to-see, easy-to-access plastic bins. The 8 standard and 4 large easy access storage containers are removable, making it fun for kids to take out toys, books, and games for playtime and quick to clean up after. This toy storage box alternative helps keep your little one’s room clean while at the same time the bins can teach color identification as well as sorting and cognitive skills.


The height of the bins in this toy organizer is just right for toddlers and preschool-aged children. This piece of furniture is a great fit for all homes, whether large or small. This toy storage organizer comes in multiple color options to complement the existing furniture in your home as well as the table and chairs sets and other toy storage organizer products in Tot Tutors’ line of kids furniture. Color options include Primary Collection: natural finish with primary bins (red, green, blue, yellow); Pastel Collection: white finish with pastel bins (pink, light green, baby blue, light yellow); Espresso Collection: espresso finish with white bins; Summit Collection: white finish with primary color bins (red, green, blue, yellow); Friends: White finish with pink and purple bins (pink, purple, dark pink, white).



Product sizing –

34""W x 11""D (15.5""D with stabilizing braces) x 31""H

Standard bins: 11.75""L x 8.25""W x 5.25""H

Large bins: 16""L x 11.75""W x 5.25""H

Additional primary colored plastic bins are also sold separately.



Tot Tutors offers a full line of children’s furniture, organizational basics, and storage solutions. We have multiple room collections that fit the style of any home. Our children’s table and chairs, toy storage organizers, toy boxes, bookcases, beds, and upholstered chairs blend with all of your home’s furniture. Whether it’s the living room, playroom, or your child’s bedroom, Tot Tutors has just the right product to help your family grow.


Remove toy storage bins for playtime
feature_bullets: Removable toy storage bins for playtime and easy clean up
Easy to assemble toy organizer for blocks, crayons, toy trucks, dolls, and more is great for boys and girls ages 3 years and up
12 rugged plastic toy bins are interchangeable, 8 standard and 4 large storage containers
Additional standard and large bins sold separately
Sturdy engineered wood construction is durable, easy to clean, and includes steel dowels to support toy bins
Perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3-8 years

Comes in multiple color options -Primary: Natural finish with primary bins (red, green, blue, yellow), Pastel: White finish with pastel bins (pink, light green, baby blue, light yellow), Espresso: Espresso finish with white bins
Ideal for organizing your toddler's bedroom, playroom, nursery, or the living room
Great storage alternative to toy boxes
Product sizing-34"W x 11"D (15.5"D with stabilizing braces) x 31"H, Standard bins: 11.75"L x 8.25"W x 5.25"H, Large bins: 16"L x 11.75"W x 5.25"H
